entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow except rain along parts of the coast. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except rainfall amount 5 mm along parts of the coast. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
